sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html' }) export class AppComponent { title = 'app'; registerForm!: FormGroup; submitted = false; constructor(private formBuilder: FormBuilder) { } //Add user form actions get f() { return this.registerForm.controls; } onSubmit() { this.submitted = true; // stop here if form is invalid if (this.registerForm.invalid) { return; } //True if all the fields are filled if (this.submitted) { alert("Great!!"); } } ngOnInit() { //Add User form validations this.registerForm = this.formBuilder.group({ email: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.email]], password: ['', [Validators.required]], }); } }
Login Form
Email is required
Email must be a valid email address
Password is required
